CustomField.description: How strong is the connection? (From -1 to 3)
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Connection_Strength__c, "3: We're on great terms."),3, IF(ISPICKVAL(Connection_Strength__c, "2: He or she would call me back."),2, IF(ISPICKVAL(Connection_Strength__c, "1: We've talked or met. That's about it."),1, IF(ISPICKVAL(Connection_Strength__c, "0: We've never met."),0, IF(ISPICKVAL(Connection_Strength__c, "-1: Maybe you could find another way in?"),-1,99)))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How strong is the connection? (From -1 to 3)
CustomField.label: Connection Score
